recipe.title: Pasta Sauce With Meat

recipeinfo.author: I'm the author
recipeinfo.blurb: A good all-around meat sauce to use with a variety of pasta dishes.
recipeinfo.author: David Horton
recipeinfo.yield: Makes enough for 2 lbs. of pasta.

recipe.preparation: In a 3-quart saucepan sweat garlic and celery in olive oil over medium-low heat. Add ground beef and raise heat to brown slightly. Drain fat if necessary. Add crushed tomatoes, spices, sugar and salt. Lower heat to a slow simmer and add cheese. Cook for at least 30 minutes, much longer if possible.
recipe.serving: Serve over spaghetti or any other favorite pasta.
recipe.notes: Make a double batch and freeze the leftover sauce for a quick meal later on.
